description:
2BR / 2Bath

Available for short term starting August 3rd! Beautiful tree-lined street, 25-foot long Bedroom, 2 bath, 2 King sized beds, generous closets, sitting areas, desk, Flat Screen TV, Wireless, Doorman

Generous, king sized bedrooms, 2 full baths, private entrance on West End Ave

Great cafes, riverside park is steps away

One block from subway
name: 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Upper West
review: This place is well-located, near the subway station, shops, restaurants, Riverside park. There isn't much noise  however, our sleep was pretty comfortable. The apartment is very spacious, has all necessary equipment. The host, Anne, was very helpful and gave us a lot of valuable advice.
